messages.title: Why we are backing Allen Simpson
messages.content: Martin Cox, MaryAnn Randall and Rob Bird explain why they believe Allen is the right person to fight for Maidstone and the Weald.

messages.title: My plan for Maidstone
messages.content: Five bold pledges to secure a brighter future for Maidstone.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Allen plans to support small businesses, bring secure jobs to Maidstone, and stop zero hours contracts exploiting workers.
Allen is against negative campaigning and will instead focus on bringing the positive change Maidstone needs.

issues.economy: Support small businesses, bring secure jobs to Maidstone, and stop zero hours contracts exploiting workers.

leaflet.personalStatement: Allen's personal statement is about his commitment to fight for Maidstone, to bring positive change, and to offer fresh ideas.

endorsements.endorsement: Believes Allen is the right person to fight for Maidstone and the Weald.
Supports Allen in his fight for Maidstone and the Weald.
Explains why he believes Allen will fight for Maidstone and the Weald.

images.caption: Allen Simpson - A serious plan for Maidstone.
